channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sudden acceleration, not a bubble, is the AI story that investors are missing, says this top researcher
item.description: A blog post by a prominent AI researcher says those worried about an AI bubble, should be thinking about widespread integration by next year instead.

item.title: Scientists can see Earth’s permafrost thawing from space
item.description: Something is rotten in the city of Nunapitchuk. In recent years, a crack has formed in the middle of a house. Sewage has leached into the earth. Soil ...

item.title: I’m 44. I have $400K in cash, plus rental properties in Dubai. I’m worried about a stock-market crash. Do I dare invest?
item.description: “My rental properties generate passive income of $6,000 monthly after taxes.”

item.title: ‘Gold is like the art market,’ declares Citi, as it hikes its target price again.
item.description: Citi hike their target prices for gold and silver to $4000/oz and $55/oz respectively.

item.title: Why Gundlach says it’s a very unusual market — and what bonds he likes now
item.description: The so-called bond king says local currency emerging-markets bonds are the place to be, at least for those willing to take on risk.
